Queensland rescue: Couple stranded in 40C heat stalked by croc after 4WD lost in flood waters https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/queensland-rescue- Couple-stranded-in-40c-heat-stalked-by-croc-after-4wd-lost-in-flood-waters/AWYMRJVEERCORBCQXULQ2XGM4Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/queensland-rescue- Couple-stranded-in-40c-heat-stalked-by-croc-after-4wd-lost-in-flood-waters/AWYMRJVEERCORBCQXULQ2XGM4Q/ Raphael FranksThe couple wrote two large 'SOS' signs in the dirt, leading rescuers to their location. Sun, 08 Dec 2024 02:38:53 +0000 An 'SOS' sign a couple wrote in the dirt in the Gulf Country in North West Queensland, Australia, after getting stranded when their 4WD was swept away by flood waters. Photo / LifeFlight
Waiheke vineyard company Cable Bay Wine Ltd convicted, fined $50K for breaching noise limits https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waiheke-vineyard-company-cable-bay-wine-ltd-convicted-fined-50k-for-breaching-noise-limits/PLBV7JLAZ5A6JMZPU42GZEQD44/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waiheke-vineyard-company-cable-bay-wine-ltd-convicted-fined-50k-for-breaching-noise-limits/PLBV7JLAZ5A6JMZPU42GZEQD44/ Lane NicholsThe vineyard was earlier acquitted after blaming noise readings on 'chirping crickets'. Sun, 08 Dec 2024 01:23:29 +0000 Waiheke Island vineyard company Cable Bay Wine was found guilty of breaching allowable noise limits and faced a potential fine of up to $600,000.

Senior Head Hunter gang member arrested over plot to smuggle 50kg cocaine from Brazil https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/senior-head-hunter-gang-member-arrested-over-plot-to-smuggle-50kg-cocaine-from-brazil/EXYZAJWKRZEPBHYQW4MZAJ26P4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/senior-head-hunter-gang-member-arrested-over-plot-to-smuggle-50kg-cocaine-from-brazil/EXYZAJWKRZEPBHYQW4MZAJ26P4/ Jared SavageThe 60-year-old appeared in court yesterday, nine months after Operation Reach co-accused.
